mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t.* FROM ( SELECT g.*, i.file_name FROM goods g, goods_img i WHERE g.g_id = i.g_id AND i.file_type = 'main_img' ORDER BY g.g_id ASC ) t ) GOODS WHERE rnum <= 8
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t.* FROM ( SELECT g.*, i.file_name FROM goods g, goods_img i WHERE g.g_id = i.g_id AND i.file_type = 'main_img' ORDER BY g.g_price ASC ) t ) GOODS WHERE rnum <= 8
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t.* FROM ( SELECT g.*, i.file_name FROM goods g, goods_img i WHERE g.g_id = i.g_id AND i.file_type = 'main_img' ORDER BY g.g_price DESC ) t ) GOODS WHERE rnum <= 8

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, t.* FROM ( SELECT g.*, i.file_name FROM goods g, goods_img i WHERE g.g_id = i.g_id AND i.file_type = 'main_img' ORDER BY g.reg_date DESC ) t ) GOODS WHERE rnum <= 8
SELECT g.*, i.file_name FROM goods g, goods_img i WHERE g.g_id = i.g_id AND i.file_type = 'main_img' AND g.g_id = #{gId }
select NVL(like_cnt, 0) as likeCnt from goods where g_id = #{gId }
